trans-unit.source: Compares two objects for equivalence, ignoring the case of strings.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due oggetti per l'equivalenza, verrà ignorato nel caso di stringhe.

trans-unit.source: CaseInsensitiveComparer implements the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings, just as <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> implements the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface supporting case-insensitive comparisons on strings.
trans-unit.target: CaseInsensitiveComparer implementa la <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interfaccia che supporta i confronti tra maiuscole e minuscole nelle stringhe, come <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>implementa il <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interfaccia che supporta i confronti tra maiuscole e minuscole nelle stringhe.</xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.IComparer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Comparer> class is the default implementation of the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface and performs case-sensitive string comparisons.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Collections.Comparer>classe è l'implementazione predefinita del <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interfaccia ed esegue i confronti di stringhe tra maiuscole e minuscole.</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Collections.Comparer>

trans-unit.source: The objects used as keys by a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> are required to override the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface) and the <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method (or the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> interface).
trans-unit.target: Gli oggetti utilizzati come chiavi da un <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>necessarie per eseguire l'override di <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) (o <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>interfaccia) e <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) (o <xref:System.Collections.IComparer>interfaccia).</xref:System.Collections.IComparer> </xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of both methods or interfaces must handle case sensitivity the same way; otherwise, the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> might behave incorrectly.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione dei metodi o delle interfacce deve gestire distinzione maiuscole/minuscole allo stesso modo; in caso contrario, il <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>comportarsi in modo non corretto.</xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: For example, when creating a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, you must use this class with the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> class or any case-insensitive <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, quando si crea un <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>, è necessario utilizzare questa classe con il <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider>classe o una qualsiasi tra maiuscole e minuscole <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider>implementazione.</xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveHashCodeProvider> </xref:System.Collections.Hashtable>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: I confronti di stringhe potrebbero avere risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> class using the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> usando il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> del thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> instance is created using this constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>istanza viene creata utilizzando questo costruttore, il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>del thread corrente viene salvato.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate le impostazioni cultura salvate per determinare l'ordinamento e regole di maiuscole e minuscole. di conseguenza, i confronti di stringhe potrebbero essere risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> class using the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> classe utilizzando l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the sort order and casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate specificato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>per determinare l'ordinamento e regole di maiuscole e minuscole.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: I confronti di stringhe potrebbero avere risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> to use for the new <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo?displayProperty=fullName> da utilizzare per il nuovo <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: culture is .
trans-unit.target: cultureis .

trans-unit.source: Performs a case-insensitive comparison of two objects of the same type and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
trans-unit.target: Esegue un confronto senza distinzione di due oggetti dello stesso tipo e restituisce un valore che indica se uno è minore, uguale o maggiore di altro.

trans-unit.source: If `a` and `b` are both strings, this method uses <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to compare the strings with the casing ignored; otherwise, it uses the <xref:System.IComparable> implementation of either object.
trans-unit.target: Se `a` e `b` sono entrambe le stringhe, questo metodo utilizza <xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per confrontare le stringhe con le maiuscole e minuscole ignorata; in caso contrario, viene utilizzato il <xref:System.IComparable>implementazione degli oggetti.</xref:System.IComparable> </xref:System.Globalization.CompareInfo.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: That is, if `a` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, then this method returns the result of `a`.
trans-unit.target: Vale a dire se `a` implementa <xref:System.IComparable>, questo metodo restituisce il risultato di `a`.</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: `CompareTo` (`b`); otherwise, if `b` implements <xref:System.IComparable>, then it returns the negated result of `b`.
trans-unit.target: `CompareTo`(`b`); in caso contrario, se `b` implementa <xref:System.IComparable>, restituisce il risultato negato di `b`.</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: `CompareTo` (`a`).
trans-unit.target: `CompareTo` (`a`).

trans-unit.source: Comparing `null` with any type is allowed and does not generate an exception when using <xref:System.IComparable>.
trans-unit.target: Confronto tra `null` è consentita con qualsiasi tipo e non genera un'eccezione quando si utilizza <xref:System.IComparable>.</xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: When sorting, `null` is considered to be less than any other object.
trans-unit.target: Durante l'ordinamento, `null` viene considerato minore rispetto a qualsiasi altro oggetto.

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: I confronti di stringhe potrebbero avere risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il primo oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: Secondo oggetto da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of a and b, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Intero con segno che indica i valori relativi di a e b , come illustrato nella tabella seguente.

trans-unit.source: Value
trans-unit.target: Valore

trans-unit.source: Meaning
trans-unit.target: Significato

trans-unit.source: Less than zero
trans-unit.target: Minore di zero

trans-unit.source: a is less than b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: aè minore di b , con maiuscole e minuscole ignorata.

trans-unit.source: Zero
trans-unit.target: Zero

trans-unit.source: a equals b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: aè uguale a b , con maiuscole e minuscole ignorata.

trans-unit.source: Greater than zero
trans-unit.target: Maggiore di zero

trans-unit.source: a is greater than b, with casing ignored.
trans-unit.target: aè maggiore di b , con maiuscole e minuscole ignorata.

trans-unit.source: Neither a nor b implements the interface.
trans-unit.target: Né a né b implementa il interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: -or- a and b are of different types.
trans-unit.target: -or- a and b are of different types.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> che è associato il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> del thread corrente e che sia sempre disponibile.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer> instance is created using the parameterless constructor, the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread is saved.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>istanza viene creata utilizzando il costruttore senza parametri, il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>del thread corrente viene salvato.</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer>

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the saved culture to determine the sort order and casing rules; therefore, string comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate le impostazioni cultura salvate per determinare l'ordinamento e regole di maiuscole e minuscole. di conseguenza, i confronti di stringhe potrebbero essere risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of the current thread.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> che è associato il <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> del thread corrente.

trans-unit.source: Gets an instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and that is always available.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> associato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> e che sia sempre disponibile.

trans-unit.source: Comparison procedures use the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine the sort order and casing rules.
trans-unit.target: Routine di confronto utilizzate la <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>per determinare l'ordinamento e regole di maiuscole e minuscole.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: String comparisons might have different results depending on the culture.
trans-unit.target: I confronti di stringhe potrebbero avere risultati diversi a seconda delle impostazioni cultura.

trans-unit.source: For more information on culture-specific comparisons, see the <xref:System.Globalization> namespace and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su confronti di impostazioni cultura specifiche, vedere il <xref:System.Globalization>dello spazio dei nomi e [globalizzazione e localizzazione](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Globalization>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"></xref> that is associated with <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Collections.CaseInsensitiveComparer"> </xref> associato <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
